1. Dissolve 4NIA in 60 mL DMF in a 250 mL flame-dried round bottom flask under N<sub>2</sub>.
Separate 500 mL flame-dried round bottom flask under N<sub>2</sub>, make a slurry of NaH in 15 mL DMF and stir.
Add 4NIA solution dropwise to slurry of NaH in DMF.
Stir at room temperature for 4 hours.
Precipitate by vacuum filtration in a Buchner funnel.
Precipitate twice with _ice cold_ water, followed by 3 rinses with ether.
Dry overnight in oven on watch glass.
